name: Death Escape / 死亡逃脱
description:
You Cannot Escape... The Ancient One is Awaken....



In the world of Escape, you start your journey in an abandoned hospital, a mystery mansion and the ancient dungeon as a Survivor, trying to escape from terrifying creatures in the darkness and avoid being caught, tortured and lose your head... A voice in your mind force you to collect coins which are from ancient time and you cannot control yourself..... The dark power will lead you to the exit... or it is just a beginning.....


Objectives: Collect Ancient Coins and Find a Way to Open the Exit

Mouse - Interact

W A S D - Move

Shift - Switch Run and Walk

Tab - inventory / Show and Hide Cursor

key Features



  • Extreme Intense Vibe- Having the ultimate horror experience by searching around the abandoned building and try to get out of here.

  • Danger is in Everywhere - Monsters will randomly cause big troubles and put you in extreme danger. You must hide or run before they find you...

  • Items Respawn Randomly - Every time the situation is different, try your best to collect coins as many as possible...

  • Interactive Dead Body - Dig! Dig! Dig! You may find something in dead bodies by using knifes... in beta version, you can use knife as many times as you can.
